title.rendered: “IDF’s Increased Control in Jebalia: A Detailed Report on Successful Military Operations and Terror Target Disruptions”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Soldiers from Brigade 98 have increased their operational control in the Jebalia area; forces from Brigade 162 continue fighting in Rafah and have destroyed long-range rocket launchers.

The combat teams of the Paratrooper Brigades, 7 and 460 under Brigade 98, have expanded their combat zones in Jebalia and increased their operational control in the region during the day.

Combat aircraft and aircraft of the Air Force attacked a weapons warehouse directed at our forces and eliminated several terrorists who had previously fired mortars at our forces. Our forces were not harmed.

The combat teams of the Commando Brigades, Givati and 401 under the command of Brigade 162 continue the fight in several areas in Rafah. Troops from Artillery Corps 401 destroyed a launch area in east Rafah where long-range rocket launchers were set up.

In the last day, combat aircraft and aircraft of the Air Force attacked about 60 terror targets in the Gaza Strip, including military buildings, terrorist cells, weapons warehouses, rocket launchers, and additional terror infrastructures.

Attached is the documentation of IDF attacks in the Gaza Strip: https://bit.ly/3wCCEdg

Attached is the documentation of IDF forces activity in the Gaza Strip: https://bit.ly/4bsubZq

Attached are photos of the IDF forces activity in the Gaza Strip: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC17052024875489456792068
